MUL16 Option

16-bit multiplier (signed/unsigned)

MUL16 option
Selected

MUL16 supports signed and unsigned 16-bit multiplication.

The MUL16 implementation is essentially free because MUL32 is selected.

Parent topic: Arithmetic Instruction Options
Previous topic: MUL32 Option
Next topic: CLAMPS Option

MUL32 Option
